plot outline: The film sheds light on the advantages of perseverance. It tries to find solutions to the obstacles in achievement. It also shows how awareness, values and education plays an important role in the development of an individual, society and the nation on a whole.
title: Zenda Swabhimanacha
plot: The film sheds light on the advantages of perseverance. It tries to find solutions to the obstacles in achievement. It also shows how awareness, values and education plays an important role in the development of an individual, society and the nation on a whole.::Cinekatta
